name: GALAXY WEB STUDIOS
tagline: Web design, eco friendly hosting, and more!
body:
### Welcome to my programming & design portfolio Hi there, and thanks for visiting my site! My name is Amanda Proctor, aka @ohkamanda. I'm from Newnan, GA and still live near the area in a nice community called Chattahoochee Hills. I'm extremely passionate about programming, web development & design, and so much more! ### About me I'm a self taught web designer and Computer Science student, specializing in building Responsive Websites that look great on any device, as well as updating existing sites to make them mobile friendly. I can also provide hosting services, help with Social Media, setup blogs and ecommerce sites, etc. I've been building websites, hosting them, and worked as an affiliate marketer off and on for over half of my life now. I built and sold my first web hosting company before I could even drive! I got out of these businesses for awhile due to personal issues, but I'm back now, doing better than ever and getting ready to take on clients again. ### My Goals I've started working on FreeCodeCamp with the goal of getting their Full Stack Development Certificate sometime in early 2017, and my goal is to start working with clients again and use the skills I've learned to help small businesses and non profits, both locally and from all over the world, to improve their presence on the Internet. I have experience with HTML/CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, web hosting, SEO, and even a little bit of Python, but I'm always trying to learn more. So if you're looking for someone to build or redesign your site, if you need help with SEO, social media or web hosting then feel free to get in touch! ### Current projects

A Tribute to Tim Berners-Lee

JavaScript Slot Machine

Exercises from Free Code Camp

My blog w/ more solutions from Free Code Camp

### Contact me The best way to reach me is either by email, at ohkamanda@gmail.com, or my main twitter account: @ohkamanda. I have another twitter as well that's mostly related to bitcoin and cryptocurrency, two more passions of mine: @coinuser, and I have profiles on codecademy and freecodecamp, and I'd highly recommend both of these sites, plus Upskill to anyone else trying to learn some of this stuff!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
